channel.title: Data Analytics and Computational Social Science
channel.description: This is a DACSS course website for student work offered at UMass Amherst.

image.title: Data Analytics and Computational Social Science

item.title: Homework 5
item.dc:creator: Stephanie Cortez
item.description: For this assignment, you must select at least two variables of interest from your dataset, provide a basic description of the variables, clean and recode as needed, and present descriptive statistics and any visualizations.

item.title: Homework 4
item.dc:creator: Stephanie Cortez
item.description: For this assignment, you will be creating and explaining a data visualization. Your goal is to build on the previous assignments, and create a data visualization using the dataset you have been working with in R. Then, use R Markdown to draft a document that tracks the creation of the data visualization. In particular, comment on and discuss: 1. What the visualization demonstrates. 2. Why you chose the visualization approach you selected, and what alternative approaches you considered but decided not to pursue. 3. What you wished, if anything, you could have executed but found limited capability to do.
